title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 260/2001 of 8 February 2001 replacing the Annex to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90 laying down measures to be taken to discourage the diversion of certain substances to the illicit manufacture of narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 260/2001
of 8 February 2001
replacing the Annex to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90 laying down measures to be taken to discourage the diversion of certain substances to the illicit manufacture of narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90 of 13 December 1990 laying down measures to be taken to discourage the diversion of certain substances to the illicit manufacture of narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances(1), as last amended by Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3769/92(2), and in particular Article 10(3) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) It is necessary to give effect to the decision taken by the United Nations Commission on Narcotic Drugs in March 2000 to include the substance norephedrine in Table I of the Annex to the 1988 UN Convention.
(2) It is necessary to amend category 1 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90 to comply with this decision.
(3) Such amendment will continue aligning the Regulation with Council Directive 92/109/EEC of 14 December 1992 on the manufacture and placing on the market of certain substances used in the illicit manufacture of narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances(3), as last amended by Commission Directive 2001/8/EC(4).
(4) The measures provided for in this Regulation are in accordance with the opinion of the Committee set up pursuant to Article 10 of Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90,
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3677/90 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 2001.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 February 2001.
For the Commission
Frederik Bolkestein
Member of the Commission

(2) OJ L 383, 29.12.1992, p. 17.
